1.0.1.name: wordpress/wordpress-petition-plugin
1.0.1.description: The plugin allows you to run a petition through your WordPress installation. The petition appears on a page or post in WordPress. Upon submitting their details the user is sent an e-mail, prompting them to confirm their signature. The may can leave an optional comment if required. Details of signatories can be exported when the petition is complete.
